link: Chai Wah Wu, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8999
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,10,-10).
mathematica: t={}; Do[i=2; While[Total[IntegerDigits[i]]!=n,i=i+2]; AppendTo[t,i],{n,48}]; t (* _Jayanta Basu_, May 18 2013 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = {my(k = 2); while(sumdigits(k) != n, k+=2); k;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 18 2016
xref: Cf. A000918 (smallest even number with bit sum n), A051885 (smallest number with digit sum n).
